visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title and labels, with a font size of 14px for labels and 16px for titles, Data series: The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart displaying monthly average temperatures. The chart is titled 'Monthly Average Temperature' with a dark blue color for the title and labels, styled with a font size of 14px for labels and 16px for titles. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a gradient color from light blue to dark blue. The chart background is set to a light gray color, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. Additionally, the chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides for better spacing.
